column4: is it possible to edit the 'Places' menu, aside from just adding bookmarks ?
not that ive ever seen. It might be possible. but ive seen that asked in here a few times.. and never seen a 'yes' answer.
you can add bookmarks for other locations easieally enough
people often ask how to remove those.. thats not doable i think.. adding bookmarks or drag/droping a dir to the sidebar will add things there.. as will teh connect to... menu item
